thread.title_full: Les Tournelles and La Marais, ideally matched in the City of Lights!! - Review of Les Tournelles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andres W
title: Les Tournelles and La Marais, ideally matched in the City of Lights!!
text:
This was my second visit since the hotel has been refurbished; I had stayed there previously so I know the building well. The redecoration is exquisite of this boutique hotel and is a very comfortable. Although the bedrooms are small, they are well appointed, lovely. The key difference with this hotel is the staff who provide excellent customer service. I found Carlos and Gabriela very helpful in providing information about various places. That service also was the same with the other staff with whom I interacted. It does feel like home and offers an understated service but impeccably delivered. A real gem in the great La Marais district!! Ideally situated for exploring Paris.
